title: Fated Encounter
description: One glimpse. That scent. There. Right there. Could it be … her? The female within Sean Holloway’s dreams is real, and he intends to see her face even if it means hiding behind a women’s lingerie rack to do it.With curiosity burning too hot for him to ignore, Sean turns an ordinary family errand into the chance of a lifetime only to be interrupted time and again.In this companion piece to Darkness & Light, see Jem the way Sean saw her for the very first time.Just how close is Sean willing to get before he’ll take fate into his own hands?Enough to make the impossible come true … maybe.
author: J.A. Belfield
